text: I’m old enough to remember when Trump suggesting injecting bleach to treat #coronavirus caused an outcry. Now it’s taking an off brand anti-malaria drug that will actually kill people. How does he get away with this damage day after day? Why do powerful people still support him?

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
